|flags= |tp_firmware=Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, DD-WRT, TomatoUSB, FreshTomato |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=default |default_ssid_regex=^default$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=00:1F:C6, 00:22:15, 00:24:8C, 90:E6:BA |oui_eth=00:1F:C6, 00:22:15, 00:24:8C, 90:E6:BA }} {{TagLine|Multi-Functional Wireless Router}} :[http://www.asus.com/Networks/Wireless_Routers/WL500g_Premium/ Product page] FCC photos show the device with a ''Samsung K4H511638D-UCCC'' (512Mb) RAM chip. *{{TechInfoDepot|Asus_WL-500g_Premium_v2}} (images) ===Links=== *[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Asus_routers ''ASUS'' routers on '''Wikipedia'''] *[http://wiki.openwrt.org/oldwiki/hardware/asus ''ASUS routers'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki] *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/wiki/index.php/WL500G_Premium_v2 On the '''DD-WRT''' wiki] ==Images== [[File:ASUS WL-500gP V2.png|300px]] ---- [[Has images::internal| ]] __NOTOC__
